description: Field-level documentation for all data fields in ANP data files

metadata.description: Basic information about the protected area from WDPA

name.description: Official name of the protected area

designation.description: Type of protected area designation (e.g., 'Reserva de la Biosfera', 'Parque Nacional')
common_values: Area de Proteccion de Flora y Fauna

designation_type.description: Whether the designation is national or international

iucn_category.interpretation: Ia=Strict Nature Reserve, Ib=Wilderness Area, II=National Park, III=Natural Monument, IV=Habitat Management, V=Protected Landscape, VI=Sustainable Use

status.description: Current legal status of the protected area

status_year.description: Year the current status was established

reported_area_km2.description: Officially reported area in square kilometers

extracted_at.description: Timestamp when GEE data was extracted

geometry.description: Geographic extent of the protected area

centroid.description: Center point of the protected area [longitude, latitude]

bounds.description: Bounding box coordinates as polygon ring

datasets.population.description: Human population estimates within the ANP boundary

year_2020.population.description: Estimated total population within ANP boundary for 2020
year_2020.population.interpretation: Sum of 100m grid cell population estimates. Values may be fractional due to interpolation.

datasets.land_cover.description: Land cover classification from ESA WorldCover

classes.description: Object with land cover classes and their areas

class_name.area_km2.description: Area covered by this land cover class

datasets.forest.description: Forest cover and loss from Hansen Global Forest Change

tree_cover_2000_percent.description: Percentage of ANP with >25% tree canopy cover in year 2000
tree_cover_2000_percent.interpretation: Baseline forest cover before loss detection began

loss_by_year.interpretation: Higher values indicate years with more deforestation events

NDVI_max.interpretation: Higher values indicate denser, healthier vegetation. Values >0.6 typically indicate forests.

NDVI_min.description: Minimum NDVI value observed (driest/least green period)

avg_rad_max.description: Maximum average radiance within the ANP
avg_rad_max.interpretation: Higher values indicate more intense artificial lighting (urban areas, infrastructure)

avg_rad_mean.description: Mean average radiance across the ANP
avg_rad_mean.interpretation: Low values (<0.5) indicate minimal light pollution; values >10 indicate significant development

datasets.fire.description: Burned area from MODIS fire products

burned_area_km2_by_year.interpretation: Non-zero values indicate fire activity. Zero may indicate no fires OR masked data.

ecoregions.description: List of RESOLVE ecoregion names within the ANP
ecoregions.interpretation: ANPs spanning multiple ecoregions have higher ecological diversity

biomes.description: List of biome names (higher-level ecological classification)

datasets.human_modification.description: Human modification index from Conservation Science Partners

gHM_max.description: Maximum human modification index within the ANP
gHM_max.interpretation: 0=pristine, 1=completely modified. Values >0.5 indicate significant human impact.

gHM_mean.description: Mean human modification index across the ANP
gHM_mean.interpretation: Lower is better for conservation. Well-protected ANPs typically have mean <0.1

total_occurrences.description: Total number of occurrence records in GBIF for this area
total_occurrences.interpretation: Higher values indicate better-surveyed areas. This is a count of records, not species.

unique_species.description: Count of unique species names in the sample
unique_species.interpretation: Note: Currently limited to 500-record sample. True species count may be higher.

bounding_box.description: Bounding box used for GBIF query

species_by_class.description: Count of species per taxonomic class
species_by_class.interpretation: Shows taxonomic composition. High Aves counts common due to birding observations.

top_species.description: Array of most frequently observed species with taxonomy

external_data.iucn_threatened.description: IUCN Red List threatened species from GBIF

critically_endangered.description: List of Critically Endangered (CR) species names
critically_endangered.interpretation: Species facing extremely high extinction risk

endangered.interpretation: Species facing very high extinction risk

external_data.simec_nom059.description: Mexican NOM-059 protected species from CONANP SIMEC

matched_simec_name.description: ANP name as listed in SIMEC (may differ from WDPA)

endangered_P.interpretation: Highest protection level under Mexican law

probably_extinct_E.interpretation: Species that may no longer exist in the wild

total_species.description: Total count of NOM-059 listed species

localities_in_area.description: Number of census localities within ANP bounding box

total_population.description: Total population in localities within the ANP

no_health_services.description: Population without access to health services

avg_schooling_years.description: Average years of schooling for population 15+
avg_schooling_years.interpretation: Higher values indicate better educational attainment

sample_localities.description: Names of some localities in the ANP area

external_data.extracted_at.description: Timestamp when external data was extracted
